participants:
Tamil Nadu, India (Host);

EDF Trading Limited
monitor: EKI Energy Services Ltd. (EnKing) contracted Earthhood Services Private Ltd (ESPL) to conduct verification
monitorNotes:
During the Current Monitoring Period from 16-December-2010 to 10-August-2015 (First and last date included) the project activity has supplied 3,368,443.52 MWh of electricity, and thus contributing to the GHG reductions 1,354,428 tCO2e.
The project activity has not participated in any other GHG programs except CDM. The project 
activity is registered as CDM project on 26-May-2007 under the UNFCCC Reference Number 999. There is assurance of no double counting between CERs and VCUs.
